directions: Mix together the fennel, onion, lime zest and juice, chilli and oil in a large bowl. Season and toss well.

Poach the lobster tails in simmering water for 5 to 7 minutes, then run under water for a few minutes. When cool enough to handle, remove the shell by cutting through the underside, then the shell will peel off.
ingredients: 2-3 frozen and defrosted raw lobster tails (available from larger supermarkets or frozenfishdirect.co.uk)
2tbsp each: chopped fresh coriander, mint and flat-leaf parsley
title: Fennel and lobster salad with pomegranate recipe
